attributes.action: Address car insurance companies and the amounts they’re charging for insurance .
attributes.additional_details: I believe the government should look into this because it’s became so expensive that people cannot afford car insurance and having to sell cars they own , cars help us with our livelihood day by day and they’re practically pricing us off the road. Their reasoning is because the “cost of repairs has risen” I believe this but I also know that it’s a handful of insurers that run the entire market, they literally have an ENTIRE country paying into their pot and it just cannot be reasonable.
attributes.background: Stop these insurance companies from being able to charge what they charge as they seem to have free reign of the prices they’re charging with absolutely no moderation from the government.

rejection.details:
The insurance industry is already regulated, by the Financial Conduct Authority. You can find information about complaints here: https://www.fca.org.uk/consumers/how-complain

You may wish to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636551
